org.itsnat.comp.text
Interface ItsNatTextFieldUI

All Superinterfaces:
ItsNatComponentUI, ItsNatElementComponentUI, ItsNatTextComponentUI
public interface ItsNatTextFieldUI
extends ItsNatTextComponentUI

Is the base interface of a text field component User Interface.

Current implementation of this interface only applies to <input type="text"> based components. The text is saved in the value attribute/property.

Author:
Jose Maria Arranz Santamaria
See Also:
ItsNatTextField.getItsNatTextFieldUI()
